title: Number of students in upper secondary education in Denmark 2008 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Number of students. In total the number of data points it has is 11.
Overall Number of students has increased over the Year.
Number of students is slightly increasing from 2008 to 2012, and finally roughly constant from 2012 to 2018.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
The highest Number of students, of value 150608.0 was reached at Year 2017
The lowest Number of students, of value 118217.0 was reported at Year 2008
